00034 NxVec3 Flee::Execute(AgentInfoPtr aInfo)
00035 {
00036         // desired velocity is constant and points away from the target
00037         aInfo->m_vOrientation = aInfo->m_vTarget - aInfo->m_vPos;
00038         aInfo->m_vOrientation.normalize();
00039         aInfo->m_vDesiredVelocity = -aInfo->m_vOrientation * 
00040                                                aInfo->m_fcMaxVelocity;
00041 
00042         return aInfo->m_vDesiredVelocity;
00043         
00044 }
